title: Bang Bang Chicken
directions: Cut chicken into small chunks and dry with paper towel. Squeeze lime juice over chicken and season with salt and pepper. Toss with cornstarch. /p Heat the oil over medium high heat and add the chicken in one layer. Once it is nice and brown, flip, and cook on the other side until cooked through. /p Mix together mayo, Thai chile sauce, and sriracha. Toss chicken with sauce while it is still warm. Serve in lettuce wraps, on salad, or over rice.  /p Serving size: ¼ of total yield  /p Calories: 263/serving (463/serving with 1 cup of cooked rice)
